author: R. Jun
title: Remembering Actress Lee Eun Joo On The 12th Anniversary Of Her Death | Soompi
text: Pin Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 February 22 marks the 12th anniversary of the death of actress Lee Eun Joo . A source from her former agency, Namoo Actors, said, “Agency staff and Lee Eun Joo’s family and close friends will be meeting for dinner in memory [of Lee Eun Joo].” Lee Eun Joo died by suicide on February 22, 2005. She was 24 at the time. In 2015, 10 years after her death, the CGV Arthouse in Apgujeong, Seoul held a special exhibition in honor of the actress. The actress is well known for her work in films such as “Rainbow Trout” (1999), “Virgin Stripped Bare by Her Bachelors” (2000), “Lovers’ Concerto” (2002), “Au Revoir, UFO” (2004), and “The Scarlet Letter” (2004), as well as the dramas “KAIST” (1999) and “Phoenix” (2004).
